item.description:
Come enjoy historical Marblehead on Festival of Arts! You'll find well preserved beauty of the beginning of New England. Open galleries, cafes, bays, parks, stores, beach, etc...
My place (300 yrs old national treasure), is right in the heart of an old town will serve us as a base. We will start the day here (around 12 p.m.) and meet in the evening again (5-6 p.m.) for sharing, drinks and appetizers. Bring yourself, curiosity, camera, your beverages and snacks. It will be a good continuation of Noelle's BBQ.
Please contact me with any questions/comments. Maia

http://www.marblehead...

http://www.marblehead...

I will be sending an update with my address later this week.
item.how_to_find_us: It will be at my place, in old downtown.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Marblehead Festival
